mapper.insert: insert into account (dId, uId, payTime, fee, feeType, payType, rId, cId, postDId, iId) values (#{dId}, #{uId}, #{payTime}, #{fee, jdbcType=DOUBLE} , #{feeType}, #{payType}, #{rId}, #{cId}, #{postDId}, #{iId})
mapper.update: update account a JOIN account_examinationapplication ae on a.accId = ae.accId set uId = #{uId} where rId = #{rId} and ae.eAId = #{eAId}
mapper.select: select medicine.mId, mCode, mName, mSpell, mSpecification, mUnit, mProducer,mFormulation, mType, mFee, account_diagnosis.dia_M_Id,instruction, dosage, times,mAmount,mState from medicine,diagnosis_medicine,account,account_diagnosis where rId=#{rId} and FROM_UNIXTIME(payTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{time} and feeType in ("西药","中药")and account_diagnosis.dia_M_Id=diagnosis_medicine.dia_M_Id and medicine.mId=diagnosis_medicine.mId and account.accId=account_diagnosis.accId and mState="已收费"
